actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To establish the Dwight D. Eisenhower memorial scholarships, and for other purposes.
short_title: Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Scholarship Act

summary.text: Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Scholarship Act - Establishes the Dwight D. Eisenhower Scholarship Foundation and the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Scholarship Trust Fund to award scholarships to college and university undergraduates who intend to pursue careers in public service. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Scholarship Act
To establish the Dwight D. Eisenhower memorial scholarships, and for other purposes.
